Description.Details:
You and Darius have finished networking for new contracts on {TGT_SYSTEM.Name} and are walking through a farmer's market with [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]], who is on shore leave.

A street preacher suddenly appears at your elbow. "Have you heard the good word of the Volkovites?" He presses a pamphlet into your hands, emblazoned with a stylized "V".

The preacher studies the insignia on your gear. "You! You were there when the Capellan storm troopers descended on the great martyrs."

Looking around, you see the same stylized "V" on numerous necklaces, patches and even etched into a young woman's rifle butt. The crowd has grown quietly attentive.
Description.Name: The Volkovite Martyrs
Tell them that they've got the wrong mercenaries.

Description.Details:
The confused preacher makes a half-hearted argument about your identity before giving up and moving down the street with his pamphlets.

The rest of the crowd hums for a moment longer, disappointed at the lack of conflict, but then continues with their business in the market.

Darius breathes a sigh of relief. "Commander, we may or may not have made the right decisions about the Volkovites. But they're Lady Liao's problem now, not ours. Best to stay out of this as best we can."
Description.Name: Nothing happens

Description.Details: The preacher seems confused and puts up a raucous insistence as to your identity. Then one of his followers shouts "Murderers!" and levels her rifle. [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]] leaps in the way as a shot rings out, and {TGT_MW.SUBJ} {TGT_MW.Gender?NonBinary:spin|Default:spins} to the ground, clutching {TGT_MW.DET} arm. After that, all hell breaks loose. By the time the authorities arrive on the scene, you and your team are long gone, nursing your injuries on the shuttle ride back to the Argo. Darius breathes a sigh of frustration. "Commander, these Volkovites are Lady Liao's problem now, not ours. If we must pick a fight with them, perhaps we should be in our 'Mechs."
Description.Name: Injuries
Admit that your Company was there

Description.Details: The preacher is momentarily taken aback by your admission, and then one of his followers shouts "Murderers!" and levels her rifle. [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]] leaps in the way as a shot rings out, and {TGT_MW.SUBJ} {TGT_MW.Gender?NonBinary:spin|Default:spins} to the ground, clutching {TGT_MW.DET} arm. After that, all hell breaks loose. By the time the authorities arrive on the scene, you and your team are long gone, nursing your injuries on the shuttle ride back to the Argo. Darius breathes a sigh of frustration. "Commander, these Volkovites are Lady Liao's problem now, not ours. If we must pick a fight with them, perhaps we should be in our 'Mechs."
Description.Name: injuries

Description.Details: The preacher is momentarily taken aback by your admission, but the rest of the crowd begins to hum with anticipated violence. [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]] leaps into the brief pause, punching the preacher in the jaw and the old man drops like a sack of potatoes. After that, all hell breaks loose. By the time the authorities arrive on the scene, you and your team are long gone, nursing your injuries on the shuttle ride back to the Argo. Darius breathes a sigh of frustration. "Commander, these Volkovites are Lady Liao's problem now, not ours. If we must pick a fight with them, perhaps we should be in our 'Mechs."
Description.Name: less injuries
Secretly signal for {TGT_MW.Callsign} when to attack.

Description.Details: You stall for time with the preacher, keeping him confused, yet engaged. Meanwhile [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]] maneuvers through the crowd, approaching from behind the young tough with a rifle. Just as the rest of the crowd begins to hum with anticipated violence, your MechWarrior punches the thug in the jaw and she drops like a sack of potatoes. After that, all hell breaks loose. By the time the authorities arrive on the scene, you and your team are long gone, nursing your injuries on the shuttle ride back to the Argo. Darius breathes a sigh of frustration. "Commander, these Volkovites are Lady Liao's problem now, not ours. If we must pick a fight with them, perhaps we should be in our 'Mechs."
Description.Name: less injuries

Description.Details:
You stall for time with the preacher, keeping him confused, yet engaged. Meanwhile, [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]] maneuvers through the crowd. One after the other, {TGT_MW.SUBJ} quietly disarms several thugs. The crowd is none the wiser, focused as they are on the preacher's insistence as to your identity.

The rest of the crowd hums for a moment longer, disappointed at the lack of conflict, but then continues with their business in the market.

As you return the shuttle, Darius breathes a sigh of relief. "Commander, we may or may not have made the right decisions about the Volkovites. But they're Lady Liao's problem now, not ours. Best to stay out of this as best we can."
Description.Name: least  injuries
